title: Simulation forceps training reduced severe perineal tearing by nearly 30 percent

title_detail.value: Simulation forceps training reduced severe perineal tearing by nearly 30 percent

summary: A simulation forceps training program developed for obstetrics residents reduced third and fourth degree perineal tears by 26 percent during real-life deliveries with forceps.

summary_detail.value: A simulation forceps training program developed for obstetrics residents reduced third and fourth degree perineal tears by 26 percent during real-life deliveries with forceps.
